pages.text: Arriving at the doorway took some effort - it was not where the council had promised. I suspect it may have directly warped the space around itself, but when I arrived it was deep within the corrosive Mist and I had to detour to scrap together some equipment to delve it.

pages.title: Curious Gateway
pages.text: The doorway, as I found it.

As soon as I touched the nebula at the core of the gateway, I found myself somewhere else entirely - a plane of bottomless darkness, interrupted only by the structure where I stood, seemingly torn from a lost civilization. $(br2)Curiously, though there is no evident source of light, everything is visible as if it were midday.
